segments.text: I see two children trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful and excited.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember being that excited about cookies as a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is holding a plate, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be cooperating with the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR
